aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Md Zahangir Alam
aboutData.subtitle: Web analyst expert
aboutData.text: I am a dedicated digital marketing professional with a passion for harnessing data to drive online success. Specializing in Google Ads, Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Tag Manager (GTM), and Meta Pixel, I empower businesses to optimize their digital strategies and achieve measurable growth.

services.title: GA4 Implementation & Optimization
services.text: Upgrade your analytics with Google Analytics 4 (GA4) implementation, offering powerful insights into user journeys and events across your website and apps.

services.title: Web Analytics & Reporting
services.text: Unlock insights from your website’s data with detailed web analytics and reporting, helping you track user behavior, identify trends, and make informed decisions to improve performance.

services.title: Google Ads Campaign Management
services.text: Maximize your ad spend with expertly managed Google Ads campaigns, including keyword research, ad creation, and performance tracking to drive quality traffic.

services.title: Facebook Pixel Integration
services.text: Ensure accurate tracking of Facebook Ads performance by setting up and optimizing Facebook Pixel on your website for precise event tracking and better ad targeting.

services.title: Google Tag Manager Setup
services.text: Streamline your website’s tracking with professional Google Tag Manager (GTM) setup, allowing seamless integration for all your tags, events, and third-party tools.

services.title: WordPress & Shopify Development
services.text: Create high-performing, SEO-friendly websites on WordPress and Shopify that are tailored for user experience and optimized for conversions.

skillData.title: All the skills I have in my field of work are highlighted below.
skillData.text: With years of experience in digital marketing, web development, and analytics, I’ve gained proficiency in tools and techniques that drive measurable results. From optimizing websites to setting up advanced tracking mechanisms, I possess the expertise to enhance user experience and improve business performance through data-driven strategies.

portfolioItems.title: Search Ads Campaign
portfolioItems.subTitle: Targeting for Maximum ROI
portfolioItems.description: A successful Google Ads campaign aimed at eCommerce shoppers, focusing on high-intent search terms, resulting in a 35% increase in conversion rates.

portfolioItems.title: Remarketing Success Story
portfolioItems.subTitle: Bringing Back Lost Customers
portfolioItems.description: A remarketing strategy targeting previous visitors, achieving a 40% increase in returning customers and improved customer retention rates.

portfolioItems.title: Google Shopping Campaign
portfolioItems.subTitle: Enhancing Product Listings
portfolioItems.description: A Google Shopping campaign with enhanced product listings and bid adjustments, resulting in a 15% increase in product page clicks and sales.

portfolioItems.title: Google Analytics (GA4)
portfolioItems.subTitle: Enhanced eCommerce Tracking Setup
portfolioItems.description: Setting up enhanced eCommerce tracking for an online store, enabling deeper insights into product performance and user behavior, resulting in a 20% boost in sales.

portfolioItems.title: Advanced Goal Conversion Tracking
portfolioItems.subTitle: Measuring Success through Accurate Conversion Data
portfolioItems.description: Implementing advanced goal tracking to measure critical business outcomes, leading to a 15% improvement in marketing campaign performance.

portfolioItems.title: Googlr Looker Studio
portfolioItems.subTitle: Sales Performance Dashboard
portfolioItems.description: A Google Looker dashboard providing real-time sales data, helping business stakeholders make quick, informed decisions, leading to a 25% improvement in sales strategy.

portfolioItems.title: Enhanced Conversion Tracking
portfolioItems.subTitle: Collection for eCommerce Data
portfolioItems.description: Implemented Facebook's Conversion API to capture server-side data, improving the accuracy of conversion tracking by 30% and reducing data loss from ad blockers.

portfolioItems.title: FB Conversion API
portfolioItems.subTitle: Data Accuracy Boost with Conversion API
portfolioItems.description: Integrated Facebook's Conversion API to improve the reliability of ad data, resulting in a 20% increase in campaign performance by better matching conversions to ad interactions.

portfolioItems.title: Product Performance Dashboard
portfolioItems.subTitle: Monitoring Top-Performing Products
portfolioItems.description: A detailed Google Looker dashboard tracking product performance, helping the client optimize inventory and focus on best-sellers, leading to a 30% increase in sales.

portfolioItems.title: Google merchant center
portfolioItems.subTitle: Optimizing Product Listings
portfolioItems.description: Developed and optimized product feeds for Google Merchant Center, leading to a 35% increase in product visibility and a 20% boost in sales through Shopping Ads.

portfolioItems.title: Advanced Feed Management
portfolioItems.subTitle: Listings for Better Performance
portfolioItems.description: Managed and optimized product feeds for over 10,000 SKUs, reducing feed errors by 40% and improving campaign efficiency by generating targeted Google Shopping ads.

portfolioItems.title: Google Merchant Center
portfolioItems.subTitle: Targeted Shopping Ads
portfolioItems.description: Utilized Google Merchant Center to create seasonal product listings, resulting in a 25% increase in sales during holiday seasons through customized shopping campaigns.

portfolioItems.title: Google Tag Manager
portfolioItems.subTitle: Streamlined Tag Implementation
portfolioItems.description: Implemented a comprehensive tagging strategy using GTM for an eCommerce store, enabling detailed tracking of user behavior and purchase funnels. Resulted in a 20% improvement in conversion rate optimization (CRO) insights.

portfolioItems.title: Enhanced Event Tracking
portfolioItems.subTitle: Tracking User Interactions
portfolioItems.description: Configured custom event tracking tags for key user actions, such as add-to-cart and product view, leading to a 15% increase in actionable insights that helped refine marketing strategies.

portfolioItems.title: Google Ads Tracking via GTM
portfolioItems.subTitle: ccurate Conversion Data
portfolioItems.description: Set up Google Ads conversion tracking using GTM, providing precise data on ad performance. This enabled a 25% increase in campaign efficiency by refining targeting based on accurate conversion paths.

portfolioItems.title: Google ads
portfolioItems.subTitle: Video Ads Driving eCommerce Sales
portfolioItems.description: An engaging video ad strategy that targeted specific user demographics, leading to a 25% increase in video ad engagement and sales growth.

portfolioItems.title: Google ads
portfolioItems.subTitle: Enhancing Product Listings
portfolioItems.description: A Google Shopping campaign with enhanced product listings and bid adjustments, resulting in a 15% increase in product page clicks and sales.

portfolioItems.title: High-Converting Search Ads for eCommerce
portfolioItems.subTitle: Targeted Google Search Campaigns
portfolioItems.description: Developed and managed a Google Search campaign for an eCommerce business, focusing on high-intent keywords. Achieved a 35% increase in conversion rate and a 28% lower cost per acquisition (CPA).

portfolioItems.title: Remarketing for Abandoned Cart Recovery
portfolioItems.subTitle: Bringing Customers Back
portfolioItems.description: Tailored Ads, Implemented dynamic remarketing ads that targeted users who abandoned their carts. The campaign resulted in a 40% increase in cart recovery rate and a 20% lift in revenue from returning customers.

portfolioItems.title: GAds for Product-Level Targeting
portfolioItems.subTitle: Driving Qualified Traffic
portfolioItems.description: Launched a Google Shopping campaign to promote a specific product line, optimizing product feed and bids. The campaign delivered a 50% increase in qualified traffic and a 25% improvement in ROAS (Return on Ad Spend).

portfolioItems.title: Performance Max Campaign
portfolioItems.subTitle: Full-Funnel Performance with Google Ads
portfolioItems.description: Launched a Performance Max campaign, combining search, display, YouTube, and shopping ads into a unified strategy. The campaign delivered a 30% increase in conversions and a 25% improvement in cost efficiency across channels.

informations.text: I needed help with Google Analytics 4 and GTM integration for my WordPress site, and Tracking_by_gtm exceeded my expectations. They explained everything clearly and made the whole process easy to understand. Great service!

informations.title: David Perl
informations.text: Very professional and knowledgeable! I hired Tracking_by_gtm to handle my Google Ads conversion tracking and GA4 setup. Everything was done perfectly, and I’m already seeing improvements in my campaigns. Will definitely hire again.

informations.title: Richard Miles
informations.text: Top-notch service! Tracking_by_gtm handled my Facebook Pixel setup through Google Tag Manager with great efficiency. They were patient and answered all my questions, making sure I understood every step. Highly recommended!

informations.title: Jacob Freudiger
informations.text: Tracking_by_gtm is my go-to expert for all things Google Analytics and Tag Manager. I’ve worked with them on multiple projects and they always deliver excellent results. Super easy to work with and highly reliable!

informations.title: Junaid Sheikh
informations.text: Amazing experience working with Tracking_by_gtm! They helped set up Google Tag Manager and Facebook Pixel on my Shopify store flawlessly. Communication was clear, and the work was delivered even faster than expected. Highly recommend for any tracking needs!

informations.title: Lorenz
informations.text: Great work ! Very quick to get me solutions. He left everything to fix an immediate problem I had. I would not look elsewhere. Amazing !

experience.title: Founder TrackingbyGTM
experience.subTitle: Tutor entrepreneur
experience.text: As the founder of TrackingbyGTM, I specialize in teaching businesses and individuals how to leverage tools like Google Tag Manager (GTM) and Facebook Pixel to track user behavior and optimize digital marketing efforts. I design and deliver in-depth courses that simplify complex tracking systems, helping professionals implement data-driven strategies for better performance.

experience.title: Digital makreting course tutor
experience.subTitle: Skillupper & WebVisionsBD
experience.text: I have been a lead tutor for digital marketing courses, covering core areas such as Google Ads, GA4, GTM, and Facebook Pixel. At Skillupper and WebVisionsBD, I’ve helped students and businesses master the skills needed to run successful digital marketing campaigns and enhance their online presence. My courses focus on practical implementation and measurable results.

experience.title: Web Analytics Expert
experience.subTitle: GA4,GTM,FB(CAPI),GMC,Google ads
experience.text: During this period, I worked as a Web Analytics Expert, providing data-driven insights to optimize online performance. I implemented advanced analytics setups using Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Tag Manager (GTM), Facebook Conversion API (CAPI), Google Merchant Center (GMC), and Google Ads. My expertise helped businesses track critical metrics, make informed decisions, and improve their digital marketing strategies.

education.title: Master of Computer Science
education.subTitle: Jahangirnagar University
education.text: Jahangirnagar University is a fully residential public research university located in Savar, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Known for its beautiful campus and vibrant academic environment, it offers a wide range of programs across various disciplines. The university is recognized for its strong emphasis on research and education,

education.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
education.subTitle: Dhaka University of Engineering and Technology
education.text: Dhaka University of Engineering & Technology (DUET), Gazipur, commonly known as DUET and formerly BIT Dhaka, is a public engineering and technological research university located in Gazipur, Bangladesh. DUET specializes in offering undergraduate and postgraduate degrees in engineering

education.title: Diploma in Computer Science
education.subTitle: Dinajpur Polytechnic institute
education.text: DINAJPUR Polytechnic institute a largest and reputed Government polytechnic institute in Bangladesh which was established in 1964.

contactData.title: Contact Info

contactData.text: I'm always here to assist you. Whether you have inquiries about our services, need support, or just want to get in touch, feel free to reach out via the methods below. Our team will respond promptly to ensure you have all the information and assistance you need.
